TopicTitle: Pop-up list to select target when several are close together.

Articles.Content: Unless there's already a trick to selecting the target you want and NOT the one next to it that keeps getting picked.
And for switching ships in render range

Yes.

And for switching ships in render range

And yes.

And also global list of possible targets (LKO can get pretty crowded, ya'know?), but somewhere out of side. Maybe in map view, near the top panel of types of objects.
Plus something else like that to select tanks and parts in crafts. Sometimes it's hard to click a certain part in mid-flight

Plus something else like that to select tanks and parts in crafts. Sometimes it's hard to click a certain part in mid-flight

Oh, and as we are talking about selecting parts - the same thing in the VAB/SPH for adding action groups, for the more complex crafts (especially landers and rovers that need to have their CoM low) it can become a pain to set up action groups after designing the craft.

Generally speaking - just make searching things easier.

You can use editor extensions in the VAB/SPH. There was a mod for editor part selection but I have forgotten. For target selection I think you might be looking for haystack
